info.description: Production-ready RESTful API for e-commerce platform built with Go and Clean Architecture.
info.title: E-Commerce API

post.description: Create a new product category (Admin only)

put.description: Update an existing category by ID (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a category by ID (Admin only)

put.description: Update the status of a specific order (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all orders in the system (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new product in the catalog (Admin only)

put.description: Update an existing product by ID (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a product by ID (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all registered users (Admin only)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token

get.description: Search for a product by its name
Retrieve all products from the catalog

post.description: Create a new user account with email, password, and username

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Get all items in the authenticated user's cart

delete.description: Remove all items from the authenticated user's cart

post.description: Convert cart items into an order and clear the cart

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to checkout

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's cart

delete.description: Remove a product from cart or decrease its quantity by 1
Cancel a specific order by its ID

get.description: Get all orders for the authenticated user
Get the profile information of the authenticated user

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile (username, email, password)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
